short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get detailed, reproducible bug reports directly in your favorite bug tracker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Works with you Favorite Tools

Simply click on the User Bug Report, press submit a bug, and create a wonderful bug report in your favorite tools like GitHub, Trello, JIRA, AWS, Slack, and even good old Email!

* Always Reproducible

User Bug Report collects console logs, network requests, screenshots, and page metadata to make it quick and easy to reproduce the issue. 

* Instant Feedback
Let your users tell you as soon as something breaks. With the click of a button, User Bug Report lets them submit bug reports directly from your app.
